page.title: 12WHY WE LIKE TYDD ST.GILES
page.content: We like living in our village because of - the countryside -fresh country air - smell of the country - the interesting village church - the little cows, the sheep and the lambs - the pleasant school and the village playing field - the friendly people - the quiet roads with only a little traffic - the peace and quiet of the village, except when the R.A.F. is practising over the marshes - the flowers and trees - the birds singing - fishing in the drains - walking along the straight roads - lots of space to play in - the friendly animals - no big factories and cities - the neat,tidy,well tended gardens and fields.
